Definition: Given an English language product review, you must determine if it is a Good Review or a Bad Review. A good review is one where the review has positive tone and Bad review is one where the tone of the review is negative.

Positive Examples.input: The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is good because it has positvie tone as the reviewer suggested it really likes the sound and the output is also Good Review.So this example is positive example

Positive Examples.input: My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad because it has negative tone as suggested in the product review that the user is disappointed by the product and the output is also Bad review. So this example is positive example

Negative Examples.input: This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Good review as there is positive tone in the sentence but it has been output as Bad Review so this example is negative

Negative Examples.input: This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad review as there is negtvie tone in the sentence but it has been output as Good Review so this example is negative

Instances.input: This battery was a great value, but didn't last long. I guess it made good backup power, when I wasn't out in the cold. Also, you had to get right up next to an outlet for power supply. Not exactly ideal for hiking or back packing. Maybe better on an automobile.

I've been using these batteries for years and never had to replace them. The original are good also. We have a lot of wireless devices in our home so we go through lots of batteries. These are far more durable than any other brands. They're just as described. Great price too. I would certainly purchase again when needed. Thank you.

Awesome little case for my Kindle. This was a replacement of the first one and this thing keeps everything safe in here. I love it! Also, it takes me only second to put down the kindle when leaving or going out which comes in handy since its always on me, so now no more wondering what I'm holding all over me. No problem closing up either. Great product. And Amazon shipped lightning fast! Definitely suggest buying this!

I have used this product many times before and the results are always outstanding. I was surprised when we opened a can that it wasn't like that. The sauce on top had leaked into the cans of tuna. This is one thing where I'll find out later. In summary, buyer beware, maybe we'll get lucky but I'd bet my last dollar it's been compromised.

I purchased this book because of my experience as a college student during the 70's and 80's. This is a good example of an underutilized tool in education today. There was just enough detail to whet your appetite, but not too much that you need more. If there were more examples it would have been more helpful. I bought the Kindle version which should give me increased value.
Fits perfect over my iPad Mini! Just the right size to throw in a bag or backpack with no worries of damaging your iPad. Great color,too. I love that opening is just big enough to reach through.

When I bought the package containing three sets of glasses, one in each size, I expected that they would have been made with a nice strong glass. After only two weeks, one glass had already broken and since it's not being thrown around, I don't think I'll be getting another set. It's too bad! They are so pretty, but, because of poor quality, they're just fine for everyday wear.

I thought this was going to be an excellent film, but the writing is almost non-existent. Most of my friends who saw it, wanted me to. But a part way through, the storyline went south for me. The ending left too many unanswered questions. If you are looking something good in this genre, and need a movie that can suck out all tension, watch this. Otherwise, don't waste your time.
